slug.title: Slug
slug.description: URL-friendly identifier in kebab-case. Should be unique per parent (parentId + slug enforced at the DB layer).

name.title: Category Name
name.description: The name of the category. Should be unique per parent alongside slug (enforced at the DB layer).

parentId.title: Parent Category ID
parentId.description: The identifier of the parent category, if any. Null if the category is top-level. Parents must be top-level (no deeper than two levels; enforced outside JSON Schema).
